short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop spending too much time on useless websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop spending too much 🕑 on useless websites. 

Blacklist websites you procrastinate on and select how many time you want to stay on it before receiving an alert to go back to work! 👍

If you think the extension hurts privacy, look at the source on the website!

📜 History:
 * 0.9.0 => Release day! 🎆
